problem_text_cn: 如图,圆锥的底面半径为1,母线长为3,则这个圆锥的侧面积是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of the bottom surface of the cone is N_0, and the length of the generatrix is N_1, then the lateral area of ​​the cone is ()
raw_answer: 解:圆锥的底面周长为:2πr=2π×1=2π,∴圆锥的侧面展开扇形的弧长为:2π,∴其面积为:\frac{1}{2}lr=\frac{1}{2}×2π×3=3π,故选:C．
notes: Not annotated and without notes added.
